item.title: Profile
item.description: Short Bio (CV) Dr. Kaiyang Zhou is currently a research fellow (affiliated with MMLab@NTU) at NTU Singapore, working with Prof. Ziwei Liu and Prof. Chen Change Loy. He received his PhD (2020) in computer science from the University of Surrey, UK, under the supervision of Prof. Tao Xiang. His research lies at the intersection of machine learning and computer vision with specialization in domain generalization (aka out-of-distribution generalization), transfer learning and efficient deep learning.
